languages.text: {n}Жилистый старик с почтением склоняет голову:{/n} "Благословение Двуглавого Бога-орла постигло Кетца Темер с вашим прибытием, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}! Этот слуга небес, земли и тех, кто между, давно узрел во снах сей разговор. Этот слуга надеется, что посланни{mf|к|ца} далеких звезд принесет мир лесам его племени".

traits.locale_text: {n}Жилистый старик с почтением склоняет голову:{/n} "Благословение Двуглавого Бога-орла постигло Кетца-аль Хет с вашим прибытием, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}! Этот слуга небес, земли и тех, кто между, давно узрел во снах сей разговор. Этот слуга надеется, что посланни{mf|к|ца} далеких звезд принесет мир лесам его племени".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars will bring peace to the forests of his tribe."
languages.original_text: {n}Жилистый старик с почтением склоняет голову:{/n} "Благословение Двуглавого Бога-орла постигло Кетца Темер с вашим прибытием, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}! Этот слуга небес, земли и тех, кто между, давно узрел во снах сей разговор. Этот слуга надеется, что посланни{mf|к|ца} далеких звезд принесет мир лесам его племени".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence:{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-headed Eagle-God had descended upon Quetza Temer, o Starborn! This servant of the skies, the earth and those in-between had foreseen this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that the Heavenly Envoy of the faraway stars will bring peace to the forests of his tribe."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}El nervudo anciano inclina la cabeza a modo de reverencia:{/n} «Con tu llegada, la bendición del Dios Águila de Dos Cabezas ha descendido a Quetza Temer, ¡oh {mf|Hijo|Hija} de las Estrellas! Este siervo del cielo, la tierra y todo lo que hay entre ambos tuvo esta conversación en sus sueños hace mucho tiempo. Este siervo alberga la esperanza de que {mf|el Emisario|la Emisaria} Celestial de las estrellas lejanas traiga la paz a los bosques de su tribu».
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars will bring peace to the forests of his tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}El nervudo anciano inclina la cabeza a modo de reverencia:{/n} «Con tu llegada, la bendición del Dios Águila de Dos Cabezas ha descendido a Quetza Temer, ¡oh {mf|Hijo|Hija} de las Estrellas! Este siervo del cielo, la tierra y todo lo que hay entre ambos había tenido esta conversación en sus sueños hace mucho tiempo. Este siervo alberga la esperanza de que {mf|el Emisario|la Emisaria} Celestial de las estrellas lejanas traiga la paz a los bosques de su tribu».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}这位身材结实的老人恭敬地低下了头。{/n}“噢，星裔，双头鹰神的祝福随着您的到来，一同降临在格扎尔特默！这位天空、大地与万物的仆人很久以前就在梦中预见到了此刻的谈话。此仆人希望，遥远群星的圣使能给他部落的森林带来和平。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars will bring peace to the forests of his tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位身材结实的老人恭敬地低下了头。{/n}“噢，星裔，双头鹰神的祝福随着您的到来，一同降临在格扎尔特默！这位天空、大地与万物的仆人很久以前就在梦中预见到了此刻的谈话。此仆人希望，遥远群星的天使能给他部落的森林带来和平。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Le vieillard au corps noueux incline respectueusement la tête.{/n} « Par votre venue, c'est l'Aigle-Dieu à deux têtes qui descend sur Quetza Temer, ô Stellaire ! Ce serviteur des cieux, de la terre et de ce qu'il y a entre les deux a vu cette conversation en rêve il y a bien longtemps. Il espère que l'émissaire céleste des étoiles lointaines apportera la paix aux forêts de sa tribu. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars will bring peace to the forests of his tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme au corps noueux incline respectueusement la tête.{/n} « Par votre venue, c'est l'Aigle-Dieu à deux têtes qui descend sur Quetza Temer, ô Stellaire ! Ce serviteur des cieux, de la terre et de ce qu'il y a entre les deux a vu cette conversation en rêve il y a bien longtemps. Il espère que l'émissaire céleste des étoiles lointaines apportera la paix aux forêts de sa tribu. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}筋骨たくましい老人が敬虔な面持ちで頭を下げる。{/n}「あなたの到着により、双頭の鷲神の祝福がケツァ・テメルに降り注いだ！空と大地、そしてその間にいる者たちのしもべは、はるか昔、夢の中でこの会話を予見していた。このしもべは、先導者とその一族が、遥か彼方の星の天の先駆者が、部族の森に平和をもたらしてくれることを願っている」
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars will bring peace to the forests of his tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}筋骨たくましい老人が敬虔な面持ちで頭を下げる。{/n}「あなたの到着により、双頭の鷲神の祝福がケツァ・テメルに降り注いだ！空と大地、そしてその間にいる者たちのしもべは、はるか昔、夢の中でこの会話を予見していた。このしもべは、先導者とその一族が、遥か彼方の星の天の先駆者が、部族の森に平和をもたらしてくれることを願っている」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Der drahtige alte Mann neigt ehrfürchtig den Kopf.{/n} "Mit Eurer Ankunft ist der Segen des zweiköpfigen Adler-Gottes auf Quetza Temer herniedergegangen, o {mf|Sternengeborener|Sternengeborene}! Dieser Diener der Himmel, der Erde und aller Reiche dazwischen hat diese Unterhaltung vor langer Zeit in seinen Träumen vorhergesehen. Dieser Diener hofft, dass der Himmel-Herold Frieden in die Wälder seines Stammes bringen wird."
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars will bring peace to the forests of his tribe."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der drahtige alte Mann neigt ehrfürchtig den Kopf:{/n} "Mit Eurer Ankunft ist der Segen des zweiköpfigen Adler-Gottes auf Quetza Temer herniedergegangen, o {mf|Sternengeborener|Sternengeborene}! Dieser Diener der Himmel, der Erde und aller Reiche dazwischen hat diese Unterhaltung vor langer Zeit in seinen Träumen vorhergesehen. Dieser Diener hofft, dass {mf|der himmlische Gesandten|die himmlische Gesandte} Frieden in die Wälder seines Stammes bringen wird."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Kuvvetli ihtiyar adam, saygıyla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ey Yıldızdoğan, gelişinle birlikte Çift Başlı Kartal Tanrı'nın lütfu Quetza Temer'i fethetti! Göklerin, toprağın ve arada kalan her şeyin bu hizmetkârı, sohbetimizi uzun vakitler evvel rüyalarında öngördü. Bu hizmetkâr, uzaklardaki yıldızların Gök Müjdecisi'nin kabilesinin ormanlarına huzur getirmesini umuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The sinewy old man bows his head in reverence.{/n} "With your arrival, the blessing of the Two-Headed Eagle-God has descended upon Quetza Temer, O Starborn! This servant of the skies, earth, and those in between foresaw this conversation in his dreams a long time ago. This servant hopes that the Sky-Herald of the faraway stars will bring peace to the forests of his tribe."
